contentrichtext.text: {{citation style|date=July 2011}} '''La Ruffiana''' (in Italian, pimp or whore) is an older female character of the ''[[commedia dell'arte]]'' with a shady past or who used to be a prostitute. She is used most often in relationship to the [[vecchio|vecchi]] of which group she is a nominal member. Ruffiana is most often romantically involved with [[Pantalone]], though his love may easily be unrequited if it suits the plot. Ruffiana can also be used to describe a witch ==References== * Bettella, Patrizia. (2005) ''The Ugly Woman'', University of Toronto Press. p. 71. ISBN 0-8020-3926-X. * Ariosto, Lodovico. (1857) ''Opere di Lodovico Ariosto'', L. Austriaco. p. 62. {{DEFAULTSORT:Ruffiana, La}} [[Category:Commedia dell'arte female characters]] {{theat-stub}}
